alert.note: Alert for Colville Reservation; Foothills of Northeast Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 17 at 6:44AM PDT until July 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DRY, WINDY CONDITIONS TODAY... .The passage of a dry cold front will promote windy conditions today delivering critical fire conditions to much of central and eastern Washington. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FOOTHILLS OF NORTHEAST WASHINGTON AND COLVILLE RESERVATION... * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 701 Foothills of Northeast Washington (Zone 701) and Fire Weather Zone 702 Colville Reservation (Zone 702). * Winds: Southwest 13 to 18 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidities: 16 to 23 percent. * Impacts: Any new and existing fires have the potential to spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Colville Reservation; Foothills of Northeast Washington
